about:
I am the Founder and AI Engineer at Devantix Labs, where I lead the development of intelligent, scalable AI systems for global clients. With 4+ years of experience in building production-grade solutions, I specialize in GPT-powered agents, recommendation engines, NLP, computer vision, and full-stack SaaS automation.

My work spans cutting-edge technologies including transformers, LangChain, LLMs, and workflow automation tools like n8n. I’ve successfully delivered impactful solutions across e-commerce, SaaS, healthcare, and EdTech.

Beyond client projects, I’m deeply passionate about AI research, real-time systems, and applying deep learning to solve real-world problems. My mission is to engineer the future of AI-driven automation and help businesses thrive through intelligent software.
